## Loading the data

This project is so interesting and relevant to my life!

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(ggplot2)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda")
```


```{r}
#selecting variables
president <- candidates %>% filter(cand_office=="P") %>% select(cand_name,cand_party_affiliation,cand_election_yr,cand_state)
indiv <- individuals %>% select(cmte_id, transaction_amt, occupation, employer, state, transaction_pgi) %>% filter(state=="MA")
comit <- committees %>% select(cmte_id, cmte_name, cmte_state, cmte_dsgn,cmte_type, cmte_party_affiliation, org_type) %>% filter (cmte_type=="Q")

#recoding org_type
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="C"] <- "Corporation"
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="L"] <- "Labor organization"
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="M"] <- "Membership organization"
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="T"] <- "Trade association"
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="V"] <- "Cooperative"
comit$org_type[comit$org_type=="W"] <- "Corporation without capital stock"

#join
df <- indiv %>% left_join(comit, by ="cmte_id")
head(df) 
```
